properties.name: viable
properties.description: add channel to do mindensity (selection of viable cell), NULL to ignore

properties.name: FowardScatter
properties.description: add Foward Scatter channel to do mindensity that selection of positive cell (default FSC-A)

properties.name: SideScatter
properties.description: add Side Scatter channel to do mindensity that selection of positive cell (ignored if empty)

properties.name: FowardScatter biplot
properties.description: add combination of Foward channels to do a singletGate (default FSC-A,FSC-H)

properties.name: SideScatter biplot
properties.description: add combination of Side scatter channels to do a singletGate (ignored if empty)

properties.name: FowardScatter gate range
properties.description: add mindensity gate arguments (set range), leave empty to ignore

properties.name: SideScatter gate range
properties.description: add mindensity gate arguments (set range), leave empty to ignore
